EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-Native Workshop Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},Â
Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Workshop on October 18.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email CONTACT at mhaussman@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mhausmann@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/EMEA_Event_Cloud-NativeCustomerWorkshopJLR_Manchester_Q418.html]]>
